pages.text: 53|1|viluntu maraiyum natcattirattin mitu cattiyamaka
53|2|(nam tutarakiya) unkal tolar vali tavari vitavumillai; tavarana valiyil cellavumillai
53|3|avar tan viruppappati etaiyum kuruvatillai
53|4|itu avarukku vahyi mulam arivikkappattate tavira (veru) illai
53|5|(jiprayil ennum) valuvana arralutaiyavar itai avarukkuk karruk kotukkirar
53|6|avar mikka atma caktiyutaiyavar. Avar (tan iyarkai rupattil napi mun) tonrinar
53|7|avar uyarnta (vanattin) kataikkotiyil iruntar
53|8|innum nerunkinar, (avar mun) irankinar
53|9|(cernta) iru vilkalaippol, allatu ataivita camipamaka avar nerunkinar
53|10|(allah) avarukku (vahyi mulam) arivittataiyellam avar avanutaiya (napiyakiya) atiyarukku arivittar
53|11|(napiyutaiya) ullam, tan kantataip parrip poy kuravillai
53|12|Avar kantataip parri ninkal (cantekittu) avarutan tarkkikkirirkala
53|13|niccayamaka avar, marroru muraiyum (tannitattil jiprayilakiya) avar irankak kantirukkirar
53|14|â€˜â€˜sitrattul muntaha' ennum (ilantai) marattin camipattil
53|15|atan camipattiltan (nallatiyarkal) tankum corkkam irukkiratu
53|16|anta marattai mutiyiruntavai atai murrilum mutikkontana
53|17|(atiliruntu avarutaiya) parvai vilakavum illai; katakkavum illai
53|18|avar tan iraivanin mikapperiya attatcikalaiyellam meyyakave kantar
53|19|(ninkal aratanai ceyyum) lat, ujja (ennum cilai)kalai ninkal kavanittirkala
53|20|marroru munravatu manat (ennum cilaiyaip) parriyum ninkal cintittirkala? (Avarrukku etenum ittakaiya cakti unta)
53|21|enne! Unkalukku an makkal, avanukkup pen makkala
53|22|avvarayin, atu mikka aniyayamana pankitakum

53|23|ivaiyellam ninkalum, unkal mutataikalum vaittuk konta verum peyarkale tavira (avai vanankat takutiyanavai) illai. A(vai vanankat takutiyanavai enpa)tarkaka allah unkalukku enta atarattaiyum (muntiya vetankalilum) irakkivaikkavillai. Avarkal (tankal) mana iccaikalaiyum vin cantekattaiyum tavira, (irai vetattai pinparruvatu) illai. Niccayamaka avarkalutaiya iraivanitamiruntu avarkalukku nerana vali (inta kur'an) vante irukkiratu. (Eninum, atai avarkal pinparruvatillai)
53|24|manitan virumpiyatellam avanukkuk kitaittuvituma
53|25|(enenral) im'maiyum marumaiyum allahvukkuriyanave! (Avan virumpiyavarkalukke avarrin pakkiyattai alippan)

53|26|Vanattil ettanaiyo vanavarkal irukkinranar. (Evarukkakavum)avarkal parintu pecuvatu oru payanum alikkatu. Ayinum, allah virumpi, evaraip parrit tiruptiyataintu (avarukkaka) avan anumati kotukkirano avarukke tavira (marravarukku payanalikkatu)
